name: NATIONAL EMERGENCY NUMBER ASSOCIATION
sampleDescriptions: Reclassification of 9-1-1 Telecommunicators as public safety officials. Next Generation 9-1-1 funding through revenues of FCC spectrum revenues. Mental health grants for PSAPs.
